Articles.Content:
Hey guys, Long story short, I got Jeb stranded in space orbiting Mun, I managed to get a rescue craft there in time (Barely) but when I switched to Jeb he would not respond to any command... I have tried restarting the game but to no avail... I even tried hitting him with both the rescue craft and another kerbal, again, nothing...

Help???

Heres the list of mods being run;

B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c

B9-Texture-Pack-0.1a

Engineer-Redux-v0.6.2.3

FerramAerospaceResearch_v0.13

Kethane-0.8.5

KMP_Client1

KSPInterstellar-v0.10.3

Protractor-v2.4.51

RemoteTech2_Release_1.3.3

TacFuelBalancer_2.3.0.2

TacLifeSupport_0.8.0.4

UniverseReplacer v4.0

Edited April 7, 2014 by Halcyon25
Are you running the fixed version of KSP 0.23.5 (build 464)? I think I heard that they fixed this bug in the patch.

I have 23.5.459... I'll install the patch and give it a try, Thanks

Edit: It worked, Thank you...

Edited April 7, 2014 by Halcyon25
